toast_description: You need at least one reference to start practicing
instructions_description: Doodleline is an application that has as an objective to improve the artists' abilities and bring them tools. The practice tool helps artists to optimize the practice time.
instructions_reference_desc: The application will show a set of references and the user wil have to replicate the reference by observation.
instructions_structure_desc: The application will show a set of references and the user will be able to draw over the references to analyze structure.
instructions_mirror_desc: The application will show a set of references and the user will be able to draw side by side to verify proportions.
instructions_strategic_desc: The application will combine the structure and mirror techniques. The user will be able to compare results at the end of the session.
